author: Daniel Greene
description:
Welcome to Fantasy News, where I bring you the latest updates from the worlds of books, fantasy, and gaming! Plus, a special offer: The first 500 people to use my link https://skl.sh/danielgreene11241 will get a 1-month free trial of Skillshare Premium. Let’s dive into this week’s massive stories, featuring #brandonsanderson, #GlennCook, #Dune, #georgerrmartin, and so much more!

00:00 - Mistborn Movie Update
Get the latest on the long-awaited Mistborn movie straight from the State of the Sanderson 2024: https://www.brandonsanderson.com/blogs/blog/state-of-the-sanderson-2024

07:08 - Dragonsteel Wheel of Time Leatherbound
Explore the stunning new Wheel of Time leatherbound editions from Dragonsteel: https://www.brandonsanderson.com/blogs/blog/state-of-the-sanderson-2024

07:57 - Wheel of Time Casting News
New casting announcements for Wheel of Time Season 3, including Olivia Williams and more: https://variety.com/2024/tv/news/wheel-of-time-season-3-cast-olivia-williams-callum-kerr-nu
title: How The Mistborn Movie Died💀 BOOKSHELF REVEAL!📚 Wheel of Time Casting🕸️ ~FN~
